body.name: Bluetooth Mouse, J JOYACCESS 2.4G Wireless Bluetooth Mouse Dual Mode(Bluetooth 5.0/3.0+USB), Computer Mice for Laptop/Computer MacBook/Windows/MacOS/Android - Gray
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 5 mins
features: 👉【DUAL MODE BLUETOOTH MOUSE】Triple mode wireless mouse realizes free switches between three devices with one mouse only by only one click. Our computer mouse can be connected to two device through Bluetooth and the other through 2.4G USB Receiver.

👉【SILENT CLICK & HIGH RESPONSIVENESS】Among 800, 1200 and 1600 to meet different needs. Special soundless design for the right and left buttons, make you concentrate on working or playing games without disturbing others. Smooth scroll, very precise with every sensitive movement.
👉【AUTO SLEEP MODE】The mouse will fall asleep after 10 minutes no-operation, it can be waken up by clicking any button. one AA battery is required(not included).
👉【ERGONOMIC DESIGN】 With slim, ergonomic design and smooth frosted surface, this Bluetooth mouse will fit comfortably in your hands, Provide you with a comfortable office experience.

👉【WIDE COMPATIBILITY】[2.4G Requirement]: Devices with USB interface. [BT3.0 System Requirement]: Windows 7.0 or above; [BT5.0 System Requirement]: Windows 10.0 or above; Android 5.0 or above. Bluetooth mode works with Windows/Android system.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great wireless mouse
reviews.reviewText: It worked that all I needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good for carrying around
reviews.reviewText: Bluetooth means that I don't have to remove the USB dongle from my laptop, and don't need to care about ripping a USB port when I put my laptop in my bag. And still having a USB dongle makes it easy for using with new devices without having to pair the Bluetooth.Only downside is that the sleep mode requires you to click once in a while, which I find annoying. But at least the battery life is satisfactory.I wouldn't use it for working from a single location, but it is perfect to carry with you, or use during travel. The mouse is also sturdy, which is a plus for carrying around.To sum up, this is a very good product for it's price, in particular if you plan to travel or commute a lot. Just don't forget to also carry some spare batteries ;-) (I use rechargeable batteries).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super comfortable to use and affordable!
reviews.reviewText: I'm mostly used to Dell or Logitech Bluetooth mouses so I was a bit hesitant to order this one. But I saw how many amazing reviews it had a I decided to get it! It was honestly such a wonderful buy. It came on time. It fits right in my palm and isn't too big or small. Best thing: NO ANNOYING CLICKS!! It's also very sleek and matches the black on my laptop incredibly well. I've carried it around with me and used it on different surfaces and it works great on pretty much everything.10/10 would recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable at a great price
reviews.reviewText: Great price. I use it with iPad and MacBook. They work well. It has an on-off switch which is nice to save power. Maybe some other mouse has auto off after idling. I am not using it for gaming (sensitivity can be adjusted) and haven’t used it long enough to tell the battery life. It does the job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Silent Click, Great Battery
reviews.reviewText: I didn't think I'd love this mouse as much as I do. The clicking is super quiet, it fits nicely in my hand, it auto turns off after not using it for a bit to save battery. It LOOKS great too! It's such a great deal for the price. If you're not sure whether to get it or not, I'd say just do it. I'm a super indecisive person and I'm so glad I got this mouse!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t work well with my mac mini
reviews.reviewText: Mouse isn’t responsive even after different settings. Bluetooth would recognize the mouse bit never connected. I give a 3 star rating

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I was pleasantly surprised by this mouse. It's lightweight, smooth to use. It's quiet, you don't hear the click everytime you use it. Love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Stopped working properly after second month...
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Bought this mouse beginning of March, and today it stopped working as usual. It started lagging when moving it so I disconnected it from my PC to reconnect it again and it wouldn't not pair with my PC. Then after it connected, the cursor wouldn't move. It was working perfectly up until today, so not sure what happened.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: a small easy to use mouse, looks great and minimal and has worked perfectly for the year i’ve had it. i use it for work and for gaming and it works well for both, definitely good quality for the money!!!

UPDATE 2They sent me a free replacement and this one works great.I'm happy with their customer service.UPDATEAfter a few days of working, it feels good. the right button problem is now resolved by itself. Also, I don't have any connection problems. After some time being idle, it disconnects and if I move the mouse it reconnects after 3-4 seconds. which is not bad. As someone who works with a computer all day (for so many years now), I'm satisfied with this mouse.OLD REVIEWAt first, it seemed it was not working well, and I wrote a negative review. But I gave it another shot and strangely enough, it is working well now. The build quality is not bad and the movement is smooth.I have two problems now. 1: I have to press the right button hard. otherwise it's not working. 2: When I don't touch the mouse for a few minutes (maybe 10 to 15 minutes), it disconnects and I have to move the mouse, press the buttons, and wait for about 10 seconds for it to reconnect (in Bluetooth mode).The seller offered me a free replacement or refund which is very good. The replacement may not have the right-button problem.

The handfeeling is very comfortable!Bought it for my work from home set up, it works perfectly.Its weight is appropriate, not too heavy or too light, makes it handy to use.Haven't try the multiple device function, sounds cool though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 7, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Needed a new mouse as the adapter for my old one broke as I removed it. Criteria for the new mouse were:* bluetooth plus adapter (have not used a bluetooth mouse before, wanted to try, but to have adapter as backup).*low profile*ambidextrous*good scroll wheelThis mouse fits all of the criteria very well. I especially like the knurled metal scroll wheel. Buttons are silent and positive, and fine positioning is easy. It works well on both bluetooth and adapter, and easy to switch between them, though I find there is a bit more of a delay in mouse response when starting up on bluetooth. Once going, response is perfect.Slightly surprised that the scroll wheel only has a switch function when pushed to the right, nothing to the left. But I hardly ever use that, so not a problem. Happy with it.
たまに操作ができない。
